backend/main.mo: Main canister actor managing fields, tasks, user profiles, and authorization with auto-role assignment and user-required guards.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old Field records by adding totalTaskDuration and producing updated actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their purpose and recent behavior changes.
frontend/docs/field-create-failure-repro: Guide documenting reproducible steps and expected behavior for diagnosing field-creation failures.
frontend/docs/profile-save-failure-repro: Detailed analysis of profile-save failures, root causes, implemented fixes, and validation steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document bootstrapping the React application via preReactGlobals and main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling boot flow, authentication, profile loading, error recovery, and UI routing.
frontend/src/bootstrap/bootFallback.ts: Registers global handlers to catch startup errors and render a styled fallback error UI before React mounts.
frontend/src/bootstrap/preReactGlobals.t: Initializes browser-safe global shims for process/env and loads boot fallback handlers before React loads.
frontend/src/components/AllTasksView.tsx: Displays all tasks with search, sorting, and field lookup, rendering task cards or skeletons based on loading state.
frontend/src/components/CreateFieldDialo: Dialog for creating a new field with authentication checks and backend mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Dialog for creating tasks with attribute scales, duration settings, and dependency selection before submitting to backend.
Dialog to edit an existing fieldâ€™s name and submit updates to the backend.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing task properties, dependencies, duration units, and optionally moving the task between fields.
frontend/src/components/FieldCard.tsx: Displays a clickable summary card for a field with its name, task count, and averaged attribute badges.
Shows detailed field info with attributes, task list filtering/sorting, and dialogs for creating, editing, or deleting tasks and the field.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with theme toggle, user profile dropdown, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Login screen describing app features and providing an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting authenticated users to enter and save their profile name with initialization status handling.
frontend/src/components/RecoverableBootE: Centered error UI showing a normalized boot error message and offering a retry action.
frontend/src/components/SortDirectionTog: Button with tooltip to toggle ascending or descending sort direction.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Renders a task card with attributes, completion/undo logic, dependency display, and edit/delete dialogs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor based on the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines data-fetching and mutation hooks for profiles, fields, and tasks using a resilient actor and tailored retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Initializes a robust backend actor that retries on network errors and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS setup and custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app by mounting React, initializing React Query, and wrapping with the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard UI with field/task views, sorting, filtering, and authentication-aware interactions.
frontend/src/utils/bootErrorMessages.ts: Provides functions to extract and normalize IC error messages into user-friendly text.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Utilities for converting between duration units and formatting minutes into readable strings.
frontend/src/utils/fieldCreationErrors.t: Normalizes field creation errors into categorized, user-friendly messages using boot error helpers.
frontend/src/utils/profileSaveErrors.ts: Maps profile save errors to clear categories and messages, handling authorization and IC reject cases.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, theming, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the current task-management project state, its schema version, and a list of implemented features including CRUD for Fields/Tasks, scoring attributes, dependencies, computed Field stats, and backend APIs. Serves as a snapshot of functionality and requirements coverage.
